item.title: Adding Spiritshield effects *ERROR* (Might be simple! :P)
item.dc:creator: @bhill bhill
item.description:
@bhill wrote:

Basicly im trying to add Spirit shield effects to my server and I come up with this error and im not too sure how to tackle it feedback or help would be fantastic :)! Thankyou

This is what I’m adding

if (PlayerManager.players[AttackingOn].playerEquipment[playerShield] == 9000 && Misc.random(2) == 1) { Client k = (Client) Server.PlayerManager.players[AttackingOn]; k.hitDiff=hitDiff/2; k.Send("You feel the soul of your combatant flow through your body, decreasing the damage"); k.Send("taken by them by half."); k.hitUpdateRequired = true; k.updateRequired = true; k.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } if (PlayerManager.players[AttackingOn].playerEquipment[playerShield] == 9001 && PlayerManager.players[AttackingOn].playerLevel[5]>=5) { Client k = (Client) Server.PlayerManager.players[AttackingOn]; k.hitDiff=hitDiff-playerLevel[5]/2; k.playerLevel[5] -= 5; k.Send("You feel your prayer flowing through the shield, making the shield stronger."); k.hitUpdateRequired = true; k.updateRequired = true; k.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

And this is my error.

[code] client.java:6967: cannot find symbol
symbol : class Client
location: class client
Client k = (client) PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn];
^
client.java:6976: cannot find symbol
symbol : class Client
location: class client
Client k = (client) PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn];
^
2 errors
Finished!
Press any key to continue . . .

[/code]

Thankyou =]

Read full topic
